column4: Hey, new switcher: Trying to boot the live CD on my macbook pro, using refit and following numerous guides, can't get the CD to boot at all. I see the ubuntu logo and a loading animation, and when I hit esc to see what's going on, I am spammed with error messages of varying degree (unable to read, etc). Any ideas?
did you burn it at a high speed? Try at a slower speed. Many cd's at 52x have failed for me
you could definately try from usb, it even might be faster, cheaper and produce less noise :)
Cheers, haha. I'll go off and play with that for a bit. Hopefully you wont see me again
